diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $4y-5$.
The measure of angle $BAC$ is $2x$ degrees.
The length of the line $AB$ is $3$.
The measure of angle $CBA$ is $2x$ degrees.
The length of the line $AC$ is equal to the length of line $AB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
